mcq.statement: From which groups can the judges of the Federal Shariat Court be appointed?

options.a: Serving or retired judges of the Supreme Court
options.b: Serving or retired judges of a High Court
options.c: Persons qualified to become a High Court judge

mcq.one_liner: Judges of the Federal Shariat Court can be selected from serving or retired judges of the Supreme Court, High Court, or persons qualified to become a High Court judge, as per the Constitution of Pakistan.
